alert.note: Alert for Howell (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:50PM CDT until July 01 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SHANNON...EAST CENTRAL HOWELL AND NORTHWESTERN OREGON COUNTIES... At 150 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles east of West Plains, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Birch Tree, Montier, Thomasville, Peace Valley, White Church, Teresita and Rover. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
